name: haze
flavor_text: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
effect_text_extend:
Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field.

This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect_text_simple: Resets all Pokémon's stats, accuracy, and evasion.
